markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dezullon Fountain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1883)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Air Repeater](/Weapons.aspx?ID=188)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _dezullon fountain_ is a distinct type of _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [air repeater](/Weapons.aspx?ID=188)_ made from the still-living pitcher of a [dezullon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=115), dealing acid damage instead of the gun's normal piercing damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1577" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a pitcher from a dezullon or similar creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dezullon Fountain
